results.title: Metformin Downregulates PD-L1 Expression in Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma by Inhibiting IL-6 Signaling Pathway
results.text_hl: To characterize the mechanism by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibits @GENE_CD274 @GENE_29126 @@@PD-L1@@@ expression in @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@esophageal squamous cell carcinoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@) and to evaluate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the antitumor immune response.

results.title: Targeting the SOX2/PARP1 complex to intervene in the growth of esophageal squamous cell carcinoma.
results.text_hl: Additionally, @CHEMICAL_3_aminobenzamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C025160 @@@3-ABA@@@ synergistically suppressed the growth of @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@ cells when combined with @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ potentiated the suppressive effect of @CHEMICAL_3_aminobenzamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C025160 @@@3-ABA@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@ cell growth.
